name: Pizza Casserole
comments: This is a very flexible recipe
ingredients: Italian seasoning and pepper to taste
instructions: Cook noodles according to package directions. In large skillet cook beef, onion, bell pepper and garlic. While cooking, sprinkle with Italian seasoning and pepper. Drain grease. Stir in noodles, pepperoni, spaghetti sauce and milk. Pour into casserole dish and bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes. Top with cheese, then bake 5-10 minutes more.
